item.title: How To Download Videos on Udemy Using youtube-dl
item.description: If you are like me the reason you choose udemy as a leaning platform is bbecause of their insane discount on cources, but that serve nothing if you are from a country where data bundles cost are so high like in South Africa. You add up pay more to access the course online than the actual cost of the course. I wont even begin to mention the issue of slow network speed. One solution from this is to download the videos from your course and watch them offline, I am gonna show you just that.
